headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Cholern Terrible Affray in a Dance House--Encounter between the Ringleader and an Officer--Death of the Prisoner. CAPTURE OF A HARBOR PIRATE. THE DEATH OF Mr. BLUNT. ARRIVAL OF THE "SWEEPSTAKES" FROM CHINA.--The clipper-ship Sweepstakes, Capt. JOHN SMITH" IN THE FIELD. TRIAL OF THE STRENGTH OF A BRIDGE. FIRES AND ACCIDENT. ASSAULT AT THE GRAND-STREET FERRY.

docs.lead_paragraph: A BRIDEGROOM'S SPEECH.--"The health of the bridgegroom and bride."--My friends: Of myself, at this most mystic hour, I will say nothing. No; but I thank you for my wife. Wife! bhssful monosyllable !--a blended harmony of all earth's music.
docs.snippet: A BRIDEGROOM'S SPEECH.--"The health of the bridgegroom and bride."--My friends: Of myself, at this most mystic hour, I will say nothing. No; but I thank you for my wife. Wife! bhssful monosyllable !--a blended harmony of all earth's music.

headline.main: EUROPEAN AFFAIRS.; ARRIVAL OF THE NIAGARA'S MAILS. Real Meaning of the Austrian Movements. KOSSUTH AT GLASGOW. Kossuth's Speech on the Foregin Policy of Great Britain. The Difficulty between Russia and the United States. Mr. Peabody's Fourth of July Fete--Anniversary of American Independence. The French and English in the Baltic. Public Sentiment in Italy on the War. FOREIGN COMMERCIAL INTELLIGENCE. London Markets. Liverpool Markets.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Niagara's mails reached this City from Boston last evening. We give below from out foreign Exchanges all that has any special interest. in addition to that already given by telegraph from Halifax:
docs.snippet: The Niagara's mails reached this City from Boston last evening. We give below from out foreign Exchanges all that has any special interest. in addition to that already given by telegraph from Halifax:

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New York Daily Times: In an editorial of yesterday, the 20th, you advocate the removal of all "Slaughter-houses in the heart of the City." Germans, Irish, and others, are not seriously disturbed by the Board of Health and their officers. If notices have been served upon such to discontinue the keeping and slaughtering of hogs, it has no perceptible influence, as all continue to slaughter as usual.

docs.lead_paragraph: That London law which compels all manufacturers to burn their smoke ought to be better and more thought of than it is with us. Faugh! what intolerable stenches pollute the air that is stirring, and whom none stirs, how an atmosphere of evil odors covers Gotham as with a canopy! it need not be.

headline.main: HAVANA.; Artificial Marble--The Spanish Government and the Exhibition of 1855--List of Troops for Cuba--Havana Papers and the United States--Health, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: I have had the pleasure of examining a few pieces of artificial marble made here, for which a patent has been issued by this Government, with exclusive privilege,-to Don ALEXANDRO BAUZAN, for five years. headline.main: NEW - YORK CITY.; Temperance in the Eighth Ward--Statement of Alderman Tucker. The Union of Liberal Societies. TO REPUBLICANS. Mr. HIBBARD MEETING OF COMMUTERS ON THE HARLEM ATTEMPT TO KILL AN OFFICER. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cholera. DAILY REPORT OF THE FRANKLIN-STREET HOSPITAL. Date Received Died Disc'd. Remaining Wednesday, July 19.... 15 7 4 31 Decrease of deaths since Tuesday, 3. By means of a typographical error yesterday, the number of deaths in Hospital on Tuesday was stated at 16. Ten was the true number. Yesterday's return, published above, exhibits a decrease of three.

headline.main: Slaughter-Houses in the Heart of the City.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have repeatedly called attention to the nuisance of Slaughter-Houses in the heart of the City. By their abominably disgusting odor, they are doing it now hourly for themselves. We defy any man blessed with the sense of smell to pass by one of them without experiencing one of the first symptoms of an attack of Cholera.
docs.snippet: We have repeatedly called attention to the nuisance of Slaughter-Houses in the heart of the City. By their abominably disgusting odor, they are doing it now hourly for themselves. We defy any man blessed with the sense of smell to pass by one of them...
